metadata.title: CVE-2023-28755 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A ReDoS issue was discovered in the URI component through 0.12.0 in Rubythrough 3.2.1. The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specificcharacters. It causes an increase in execution time for parsing strings toURI objects. The fixed versions are 0.12.1, 0.11.1, 0.10.2 and 0.10.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bundler - 2.4.20-1
ruby-bundler - 2.4.20-1
ruby-rubygems - 3.4.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rubygems package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.20-1').
rubygems package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.20-1').
jruby package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
